name: Warfighter - 7.62 MM Field Sumatra - Minutemen
additionalNotes: The Warfighter 7.62 MM Field Sumatra Minuteman is a medium bodied petite corona thatâ€™s perfect anytime, anywhere. Its natural Sumatra wrapper covers a Nicaraguan Habano binder, and a filler composed of Nicaraguan Habano and Dominican Republic leaves. This wonderful blend offers a consistently smooth smoking experience with floral notes and accented with subtle leather and earth tones. The Warfighter 7.62 MM Field Sumatra is handmade in Nicaragua at the Plasencia cigar factory.
